items.title: Awesome Geek Podcasts
items.content_text:
### In Russian

items.title: Awesome Dart
items.content_text:
### Template

*   [mustache\_template](https://pub.dev/packages/mustache_template) - A mustache template library that supports dart2js and dart2native.
items.content_html:
Template

  • mustache_template - A mustache template library that supports dart2js and dart2native.

items.title: Awesome Tmux
items.content_text:
### Status Bar

*   [tmux-mpv-info (⭐5)](https://github.com/Feqzz/tmux-mpv-info) Displays the current song playing with MPV in your tmux status bar.
*   [tmux-spotify-info (⭐79)](https://github.com/jdxcode/tmux-spotify-info) Spotify track info on your status bar (OSX)
*   [tmux-spotify-info (⭐13)](https://github.com/Feqzz/tmux-spotify-info) Spotify track info on your status bar (Linux)
*   [tmux-weather-info-yr (⭐1)](https://github.com/Feqzz/tmux-weather-info-yr) Displays the current temperature and weather based on your location via yr.no
items.content_html:
Status Bar

  • tmux-mpv-info (⭐5) Displays the current song playing with MPV in your tmux status bar.
  • tmux-spotify-info (⭐79) Spotify track info on your status bar (OSX)
  • tmux-spotify-info (⭐13) Spotify track info on your status bar (Linux)
  • tmux-weather-info-yr (⭐1) Displays the current temperature and weather based on your location via yr.no

*   [Initiation au langage CircuitPython et à la puce nRF52840](https://www.elektor.fr/initiation-au-langage-circuitpython-et-a-la-puce-nrf52840) - A French introduction to CircuitPython and the nRF52840.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Bioinformatics
items.content_text:
### Variant Calling / Clustering

*   **[DeepVariant (⭐3.4k)](https://github.com/google/deepvariant)** - Deep learning-based variant caller \[ [paper-2018](https://rdcu.be/7Dhl) ]
*   **[Octopus (⭐313)](https://github.com/luntergroup/octopus)** - A polymorphic bayesian genotyping model with wide applicability. \[ [paper-2021](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41587-021-00861-3) ]
items.content_html:
Variant Calling / Clustering

  • DeepVariant (⭐3.4k) - Deep learning-based variant caller [ paper-2018 ]
  • Octopus (⭐313) - A polymorphic bayesian genotyping model with wide applicability. [ paper-2021 ]

items.title: Awesome Sitecore
items.content_text:
### NET Core Headless

*   [Netcore Auth (⭐0)](https://github.com/robearlam/sitecore-netcore-auth) - A repository showing how to enable authentication in a .NET Core headless Sitecore application.
items.content_html:
NET Core Headless

  • Netcore Auth (⭐0) - A repository showing how to enable authentication in a .NET Core headless Sitecore application.

items.title: Awesome Nix
items.content_text:
### Deployment Tools / Discovery

*   [Colmena (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/zhaofengli/colmena) - A simple, stateless NixOS deployment tool modeled after NixOps and morph.

### Programming Languages / Crystal

*   [crystal2nix (⭐18)](https://github.com/nix-community/crystal2nix) - Convert `shard.lock` into Nix expressions.
items.content_html:
Deployment Tools / Discovery

  • Colmena (⭐1.6k) - A simple, stateless NixOS deployment tool modeled after NixOps and morph.

Programming Languages / Crystal

  • crystal2nix (⭐18) - Convert shard.lock into Nix expressions.

items.title: Awesome Wpo
items.content_text:
### Bundle Analyzer / Meetups

*   [BundleStats (⭐635)](https://github.com/relative-ci/bundle-stats) - Generate bundle report(bundle size, assets, modules, packages) and compare the results between different builds
items.content_html:
Bundle Analyzer / Meetups

items.title: Awesome Yew
items.content_text:
### Crates / Component Libraries

*   [tailwind-yew-builder (⭐76)](https://github.com/matiu2/tailwind-yew-builder) - Builds Tailwind CSS for Yew using docker-compose. Also supports Trunk.
items.content_html:
Crates / Component Libraries

  • tailwind-yew-builder (⭐76) - Builds Tailwind CSS for Yew using docker-compose. Also supports Trunk.

items.title: Awesome Digital History
items.content_text:
### Archives and primary sources / Germany

*   [Archivportal](https://www.archivportal-d.de/) - German archives search engine.
*   [Bavarikon](https://www.bavarikon.de/) - Collection of Bavarian maps, places, newspapers etc.
*   [Deutsche Digitale Bibliothek](https://www.deutsche-digitale-bibliothek.de/) - Over 12 million objects.
*   [Digitale Sammlungen](https://www.digitale-sammlungen.de/) - Collections of the Munich Digitization Center.
*   [leo bw](https://www.leo-bw.de/) - Platform of the State Archives of Baden-Württemberg.
*   [SLUB Dresden](https://digital.slub-dresden.de/kollektionen/) - Over 1.8 million graphic media (photographs, maps, drawings).
*   [UB Heidelberg](https://www.ub.uni-heidelberg.de/helios/digi/digilit.html) - Manuscripts, documents, maps and literature.
*   [ZLB](https://digital.zlb.de/) - Collections of the Berlin Central and State Library.

### More Awesome / Switzerland

*   [Tempopedia](https://tempopedia.org/) - Digital History Directory.
items.content_html:
Archives and primary sources / Germany

  • Archivportal - German archives search engine.
  • Bavarikon - Collection of Bavarian maps, places, newspapers etc.
  • Deutsche Digitale Bibliothek - Over 12 million objects.
  • Digitale Sammlungen - Collections of the Munich Digitization Center.
  • leo bw - Platform of the State Archives of Baden-Württemberg.
  • SLUB Dresden - Over 1.8 million graphic media (photographs, maps, drawings).
  • UB Heidelberg - Manuscripts, documents, maps and literature.
  • ZLB - Collections of the Berlin Central and State Library.

More Awesome / Switzerland

  • Tempopedia - Digital History Directory.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Tracking

- API: [WeCanTrack](https://docs.wecantrack.com)

  Description: Automatically place subids in affiliate links to attribute affiliate conversions to click data

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes
items.content_html:
Tracking

  • API: WeCanTrack

    Description: Automatically place subids in affiliate links to attribute affiliate conversions to click data

    Auth: apiKey

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Devsecops
items.content_text:
### Infrastructure as Code Analysis / Terraform

*   [Terraform Compliance](https://terraform-compliance.com/) - *terraform-compliance* - A lightweight, security and compliance focused test framework against terraform to enable negative testing capability for your infrastructure-as-code.
items.content_html:
Infrastructure as Code Analysis / Terraform

  • Terraform Compliance - terraform-compliance - A lightweight, security and compliance focused test framework against terraform to enable negative testing capability for your infrastructure-as-code.

items.title: Awesome Shell
items.content_text:
### Multimedia and File Formats / Directory Navigation

*   [dasel (⭐7.5k)](https://github.com/tomwright/dasel) - Query and update data structures using selectors from the command line. Comparable to [jq (⭐32k)](https://github.com/stedolan/jq) / [yq (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/kislyuk/yq) but supports JSON, YAML, TOML and XML with zero runtime dependencies.

### Applications / Directory Navigation

*   [editly (⭐5k)](https://github.com/mifi/editly) - Command line video editor
items.content_html:
Multimedia and File Formats / Directory Navigation

  • dasel (⭐7.5k) - Query and update data structures using selectors from the command line. Comparable to jq (⭐32k) / yq (⭐2.8k) but supports JSON, YAML, TOML and XML with zero runtime dependencies.

Applications / Directory Navigation

  • editly (⭐5k) - Command line video editor
